health_tech: FHIR APIs for Health Data Exchange
integration_patterns: RESTful APIs for Integration with EHRs

evidence.claim: Comfy utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, allowing healthcare data management.
Comfy integrates with FHIR APIs to support health data exchange.
Real-time notifications are supported via WebSockets.
Twilio API is used for messaging services within the platform.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 use cases or clearinghouse operations found.
